name: We Happy Few - Soundtrack and Digital Goods Bundle
description: This Soundtrack and Digital Goods Bundle includes the official We Happy Few soundtrack in .MP3 and .FLAC format, along with other digital goodies to fill your life with Joy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz)  /  AMD A10 5800k (3.8 GHz) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB)  /  Radeon HD 4890 (1024 MB) Storage: 8 GB available space
